title: add non_exhaustive to many public types and add const constructors for Address, Digest, Identifier
sui-sdk-types: introduce type safety with ZkLoginInputs
body: introduce type safety with ZkLoginInputs by pushing validation of iss and jwt header to construction time.

title: sui-rpc: add helper for fetching staking information
body:
Unlike in the old JSONRPC api, the new gRPC api does not have an api for fetching/calculating staking rewards. Instead its expected that clients call the "0x3::sui_system::calculate_rewards" move function (via a SimulateTransaction call) to determine the quantity of rewards that have been accrued by a staking delegation.

In order to assist with that, this patch introduces `Client::list_delegated_stake` and `Client::get_delegated_stake` methods to handle this for listing information about all delegations or getting information about a single delegation respectively.

title: types: remove ObjectId and digest wrapper types and use Address and Digest everywhere
sui-crypto: introduce bls12381 support
body: Introduce bls12381 support, adding the ability to sign, aggregate and verify validator signatures over CheckpointSummary messages.

title: sui-graphql-client: return address for CoinMetadata query
body: Added `address` to `CoinMetadata` type returned in `CoinMetadataQuery` used in Client.coin_metadata. Returning the id of the CoinMetadata object is essential from my perspective.

title: sui-sdk-types: remove bespoke json serde impls
body: Now that these types' json serde encoding are no longer the canonical json encoding for sui types we can dramatically simplify the serde implementations in this library, is most cases strictly relying on the derive macros.

title: ci: use latest rust version for wasm
[execution status] Add new execution status
body:
`InvalidLinkage` is a new `ExecutionStatus` that is added in https://github.com/MystenLabs/sui/pull/22321/files, so adding it here and will then pull this over into `main` and then rebase that PR onto it before landing.

Note that this status will not be present (in terms of actually being possible to be returned) until the new adapter is enabled.

title: owner: add support for ConsensusAddress Owner variant
body: This adds support for the new ConsensusAddress Owner variant which indicates that a single address has exclusive ownership of an object, but that the object is used as a "shared" input to transactions and version managmenet is handled by consensus similar to how this is done for shared objects.

title: Faucet v2
body: This PR updates the codebase to use the new v2 faucet APIs.

title: Hotfix: missing `EndOfEpochTransactionKind::StoreExecutionTimeObservations`
body:
This variant is missing in the latest release of `sui-sdk-types`. This time I didn't find it in `master`.

The implementation here is not polished like the rest of the library. See the two TODOs I added. If you want, you can take it over from here, but I'm happy to finish the job if given the right instructions.

IMO, it would be fine to leave the `StoredExecutionTimeObservations` inner type private for now if that means we can get it out faster.

In terms testing, I'm using this branch to patch our `sui-sdk-types` dependency that's used in our testnet ingestion pipelines and everything is working well so far :)

title: [GraphQL] Open up some functions in the graphql
body: While implementing custom errors, I realized that some functions I'd have to reimplement as they're currently private. This PR opens up most of the required functions (from what I've needed so far).

title: [GraphQL] Update GraphQL schema and make appropriate changes on ObjectFilter
body: This PR updates the GraphQL schema to the one in v1.44.2, as the `objectKeys` of `ObjectFilter` type has been dropped in favor of a `multiGetObjects` top-level query.

title: sui-sdk-types: add documentation to transaction types
fix: use `owner` instead of `object` in gql `DynamicObjectFieldQuery`
body:
This PR fixes a bug with fetching dynamic _**object**_  fields by changing `object` field in `DynamicObjectFieldQuery` query to `owner`.

I believe that change was already applied for regular DFs, but not object ones, here: #54

title: sui-sdk-types: some refactors and doc additions
body:
This PR includes a number of commits that:
- Add docs to the top level of the crate
- Adds docs to Address and a few related helper functions
- configures rustfmt to format doc examples
- renames the various `to_address` functions to `derive_address`

and it adds a bcs gaurentee and Closes #71


This is the beginning of an effort to better document the library, many more doc PRs are to come...

title: GQL updates for replay v2
body:
This PR does a few things but mainly
- it exposes the Epoch type from GraphQL
- adds the relevant epoch(s) queries to fetch the epoch data
- opens up a few functions on Page and Error. This is useful when building custom queries and reusing Client implementations, rather than hacking new ones because of the private functions. See more here: https://github.com/MystenLabs/sui/compare/main...stefan/replay#diff-52600bf8b445d87608fdcdf45a285335da6140939f250524fd2fea514444a38eR63-R129

title: Add transaction_data_effects API
body: This PR adds an API that returns both the transaction and the effects. This is useful in Replay but also in CLI v2 to avoid creating a custom query / making two requests to the server.

title: feat(sui-sdk-types)!: `Object` content getters
body:
- 41a0604 **feat(sui-sdk-types): Object::as_struct getter**

- 9cc7fdd **feat(sui-sdk-types)!: remove `Object::has_public_transfer` getter**
  Probably a good idea to keep `MoveStruct::has_public_transfer` private
  to avoid any misinterpretation there (there's a comment clearly
  stating it's deprecated)

Done as separate commits to make it easy to revert any change.

Closes #72

body: Update proptest to 1.6.0 which addresses the various bugs that were causing us to pin to a patched version.

title: remove support for generating a json schema with schemars
body: The new direction with RPC is to leverage protobuf and gRPC instead of a hand-rolled REST interface with custom defined JSON payloads. Due to that we no longer need to support a welldefined json schema from the types exposed by this sdk.

Get checkpoint summary from bcs instead of manually converting it. This is dependent on first landing
https://github.com/MystenLabs/sui/pull/20340

- [x] Update the Sui CLI to enable the new schema support.

Note: this will have to sit for a while because we have no releases in the upcoming weeks so we cannot get an updated version of the CLI that includes the latest schema changes.

title: [SDK-Types] Sdk types for tx builder
body:
This PR adds the changes needed for the transaction builder PR related to the `sui-sdk-types` crate. In a nutshell:
- adds a basic API for TransactionEffects
- renames InputArgument to Input
- renames the `Unresolved` types in `unresolved` module, and exposes the module itself instead of all the `UnresolvedTypes`.
- adds the needed constructors for the newly renamed `unresolved::Input` type.

title: [GraphQL Client] Fix digests
body: Fix the digests to use the correct types.

title: [GraphQL Client] Rework errors
body: Supersedes #45.

title: [GraphQL Client] Add a build crate to allow registering the schema in other crates
body:
Found out that registering a schema is required as `cynic` does not export it in a way that it can be trivially added to external crates that need to use `sui-graphql-client`.

This PR adds a new crate `sui-graphql-client-build` which will keep the schema file and that has a function that can be called by any crate to register the schema needed to build custom queries on top of using `sui-graphql-client`. To avoid confusion, we also use it in the `sui-graphql-client`.

title: [GraphQL Client] Cleanup of Option<Page> and add tests back
body:
This PR achieves three things:
1. Moves packages related queries to return a `Page<T>` instead of `Option<Page<T>>`.
2. Adds tests back by removing the ignore
3. Expands the package related tests to ensure there's an actual package retrieved by the query.

title: [GraphQL Client] Add transaction effects query
body:
This PR adds a transaction effects query, a multi transaction effects query, and corresponding stream version.

It also splits the existing query types into two, one for `SignedTransaction` data and one for `TransactionEffects` to avoid over fetching data from the RPC.

title: [GraphQL Client] Fetch dynamic field via owner instead of object.
body: This PR fixes a bug with the way dynamic fields are fetched. If we use the owner instead of objects, we also get the DFs on wrapped objects IIUC.

title: [GraphQL Client] Initialize the max page size in a lazy way
body:
This fixes the previous code where the `pagination_filter` would make a request to the service config to fetch the max page size when the limit is not provided. In the case of streams, this means that every time the cursor changed, a new filter needs to be created and a request to the service config for fetching the max page size.

It now will lazily instantiate that max page size value to avoid subsequent RPC requests.
